successes.title: The Micro: The First Truly Consumer 3D Printer
successes.description: The first truly consumer 3D printer should be incredibly intuitive, easy to own, and seamless by design.

Pledges.description: Hall of Fame: You will receive our awesome updates and will be front and center in our Hall of Fame on our website as a massive thank you for believing in us!
Enthusiasts:  Support the idea of ultra-affordable 3D Printing!  You will receive an M3D t-Shirt showing the five colors of The Micro and a mural of enthusiast backers' names.  Shipping not included.

Super Early Bird Adopter: This level is for those who get in quick and want the best deal! Get The Micro 3D Printer at a very limited special price and help kick off our launch. You also get a special “early adopter” badge with your order. Comes with one filament spool. Shipping not included.

Early Bird Adopter: 
Get The Micro 3D Printer at a very limited special price and help kick off our launch!  Comes with one filament spool.  Shipping not included.

Get The Micro!
A Micro 3D Printer from the first full batch of production!  Comes with one filament spool.  Shipping not included.

Get The Micro!
A Micro 3D Printer from the first full batch of production!  Comes with one filament spool.  Shipping not included.
Get The Micro! A Micro 3D Printer from the first full batch of production! Comes with one filament spool. Shipping not included.
Get The Micro! A Micro 3D Printer from a full batch of production in February (after early backers). Comes with one filament spool. Shipping not included.

Very Early Beta Adopter! You get the Micro 3D Printer from the second pre-production batch.  Reward includes 3 filament spools, your name laser engraved on the printer, you will be included on our exclusive Beta feedback panel, we'll listen to your input, and send you exclusive updates.  Shipping not included.

Superstar Backers! You not only get the earliest possible fully functional Micro 3D Printer from the first pre-production batch but also 5 filament spools, your name laser engraved on the printer, and you will even be included on our exclusive Beta feedback panel. We'll listen to your input, and send you exclusive updates! Shipping not included.
Signed Special! You will not only get The Micro, 5 filament rolls, but we'll also include a print of the original sketch design, signed by the team. Shipping not included.

Branded Special! We know you love our printer, but so does your office. We will make sure your printer is branded especially for your desk by allowing you to pick completely custom colors.  Comes with 5 filament rolls.  Shipping not included.

Big Spender! You will not only get one of our amazing printers (laser signed by the team of course!) with 5 filament rolls, but you will also meet the team and have a tour around our offices to see where we first began the creation of The Micro. All this and a wonderful meal at our favourite restaurant. Flights are not included, but a great conversation is!
